title: Shang Dynasty Bronze Vessel Print Shawl
description:
Shawl developed from Wine Vessel (Xiao Chen Xi you), late Shang dynasty (13th–11th century BC).

Neutrals played up by sumptuous silk satin highlight the historical significance depicted in the design. Inspired by a bronze ritual wine vessel “Xiao Chen Xi You” from the Shang Dynasty (1600-1050 BC). Made in China. Designed exclusively for the Art Institute’s exhibition Mirroring the Past: China’s Emperors, Scholars and Their Bronze Collections.

  • Dimensions: 26 x 70 in.
  • Material: Silk Satin.
  • Dry Clean Only.
